data.text:
The dossier is a printable PDF file, summarizing information and publications for this company. The creation of dossiers is included in your subscription. After the creation of the dossier is completed, it will be sent to your email address .

Add to dossier (if available):

History

Network

Financial development

Performance indicators

Balance sheet and profit and loss account

Commercial register publications in full text

Insolvency register publications in full text

Annual financial reports in full text (possibly very extensive)

This feature is only available to our premium service subscribers.

Learn more about the North Data Premium Service

Name

PikPerfect AG

Register

Ktreg

Schweizer Handelsregister CHE-297.075.445

Address

Corporate purpose

The purpose of the company is to manufacture, process and distribute and trade services and products related to digital media, photography and the Internet, as well as all related businesses. The company also aims to provide services in the management, storage and presentation of products from the aforementioned areas. The Company may establish branches and subsidiaries at home and abroad and participate in other companies at home and abroad, as well as carry out any business directly or indirectly related to its purpose. The Company may acquire, charge, divest and manage real estate at home and abroad. It may also finance its own or third-party accounts, as well as provide guarantees and guarantees to subsidiaries and third parties.
